ygData.subject: about continous crawl(rescheduling seeds)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Gordon, In Heritrix3.0,we can use curi.setRescheduleTime(36*1000*1000) to rescheduling seeds.and i have read the source code.I found some problems. the next
